title: reporting for completely being abusive before load in.
body:
I really don't see how people get away with this just in loading screen just because they are a 4 man nothing would be done just with my report.

_Links Removed_

replies.body:
You need to take champion select reports like this to [Riot Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and report it there. 

The boards is not the place to report or 'name and shame' other players. Not to mention the chances of a Rioter actually seeing your post is slim, compared to sending in a ticket directly to Riot Support.
